translation:
Friend and Sir Almeida. São Lourenço, May 29, 1843.

I have received your letters of the 14th and 29th of the past month, and in response I must tell you that I do not fail to recognize how much Your Mercy Jaguarão Chico a number of papers, for him to then send them to Your Mercy.

Your old and obliged friend Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu.

Answered on June 29, 1843.
